The monthly wise eligibility of this incentive will be subject to fulfillment of the below given pre-conditions and notwithstanding the justifications you will be unqualified for the incentives on those corresponding months in which these conditions are breached:

  1. No major warning letter to be received in the respective month.
  2. Not more than two (2) strikes (non-conformance) letters to be received in the respective month.

Kindly be informed the aforementioned incentive will be paid as an additional allowance to your monthly fixed salary and this will not be part of your contract salary / any other benefit calculation. All other employment terms and benefits remain unchanged till any change occurs through official notification.

Please note that subject to your periodical performance review report and market circumstances the Management reserves the right to temporarily/permanently discontinue this incentive scheme.

We are confident that you will put in your best efforts in discharging your duties and responsibilities even more efficiently and in the best interest of the organization and measure up to the confidence reposed in you by the Management repeatedly. Your performance has been exemplary and we look forward for your continued valuable service with Orion Group.

Best regards,


HR Department
